start.speaker: Rusk
start.text:
This blade won’t hold quiet. It hums like it wants a fight.

We can temper it—quiet it—or listen and learn what put that hunger there.

choices.text: Quiet it. A weapon shouldn’t crave.
Listen. If it’s a clue, we use it.

end.speaker: Narrator
end.text: The forge heat makes the world honest. The blade’s song changes, even if it doesn’t stop.
